attributes.action: Install cctv and security gating around The Dell in Woodston Peterborough.
attributes.additional_details: Because I feel its the local authorities of Peterborough responsible to make their residents feel safe in and around Woodston.
attributes.background: The residents of The Dell Peterborough would like security cameras installed as there has been a lot of house fires and residents feel unsafe in their homes. Residents also would like security fencing erected to make it more safe for residents

rejection.details:
Decisions about installing CCTV cameras in this area would be a matter for Peterborough City Council, not the Government or House of Commons.

You can petition Peterborough City Council here: https://www.peterborough.gov.uk/council/petitions/starting-a-petition
